mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM hr_holiday_days hhd LEFT JOIN operator o ON hhd.operator_no = o.operator_no LEFT JOIN department d on o.department_id= d.id

SELECT hhd.id AS id, hhd.operator_name AS operatorName, hhd.operator_no AS operatorNo, hhd.year AS year,
hhd.total_yearly_holiday AS totalYearlyHoliday, hhd.remain_yearly_holiday AS remainYearlyHoliday, hhd.used_yearly_holiday AS usedYearlyHoliday, hhd.adjustment_yearly_holiday AS adjustmentYearlyHoliday, hhd.lastyear_yearly_holiday AS lastyearYearlyHoliday, hhd.calculate_yearly_holiday AS calculateYearlyHoliday, hhd.calculate_company_yearly_holiday AS calculateCompanyYearlyHoliday,
IFNULL(convert(hhd.total_exchange_holiday,decimal(10,3)),0) AS totalExchangeHoliday, IFNULL(convert(hhd.remain_exchange_holiday,decimal(10,3)),0) AS remainExchangeHoliday, IFNULL(convert(hhd.used_exchange_holiday,decimal(10,3)),0) AS usedExchangeHoliday, IFNULL(convert(hhd.adjustment_exchange_holiday,decimal(10,3)),0) AS adjustmentExchangeHoliday, IFNULL(convert(hhd.lastyear_exchange_holiday,decimal(10,3)),0) AS lastyearExchangeHoliday, IFNULL(convert(hhd.calculate_exchange_holiday,decimal(10,3)),0) AS calculateExchangeHoliday,
hhd.creator AS creator, hhd.create_date AS createDate, hhd.update_date AS updateDate, d.`NAME` AS departmentName
FROM hr_holiday_days hhd LEFT JOIN operator o ON hhd.operator_no = o.operator_no LEFT JOIN department d on o.department_id= d.id
ORDER BY hhd.create_date DESC
limit #{start} , #{rows}
